content.professionalSummary: Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable and secure web applications. Specialized in JavaScript, React, and Node.js, with a strong background in DevOps, cloud infrastructure (AWS), and team leadership. Passionate about clean architecture, testing automation, and mentoring junior developers.
content.careerObjective: To lead cross-functional teams in designing innovative SaaS platforms that improve developer productivity and end-user experience through automation and modern web technologies.

employmentHistory.description:
Description:

  • Led the development of a multi-tenant SaaS platform for HR analytics using Nuxt 3, Flask, and PostgreSQL, increasing platform scalability by 40%.

  • Integrated AI-powered resume parsing and skill-matching models using HuggingFace Transformers and OpenAI APIs.

  • Introduced CI/CD pipelines with GitLab and Docker Compose, reducing deployment time by 60%.

  • Mentored 3 junior developers and established coding guidelines and code review processes.

Key Technologies: Nuxt 3, TypeScript, Python, Flask, Docker, Redis, PostHog, Stripe API

  1. Developed internal dashboards and REST APIs for managing IoT devices.

  2. Built a custom real-time notification service using WebSockets and Redis Streams.

  3. Migrated legacy frontend from Vue 2 to Vue 3 Composition API, improving performance and maintainability.

• Developed single-page applications with React and REST APIs using Node.js and Express.
  • Improved frontend performance by 40% via code-splitting and lazy loading.
  • Collaborated with designers and product managers in Agile sprints.

• Assisted in developing e-commerce sites using PHP and jQuery.
  • Wrote unit tests and handled bug fixing during maintenance phases.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with Honors. Activities: Women in Tech Club, ACM Student Chapter.

publications.description: A detailed guide on improving React app rendering speed through memoization and profiling.

publications.title: Scaling Node.js Applications
publications.description: Discusses design patterns and load balancing strategies for large-scale Node.js systems.

projects.name: Open Source Contribution - React Query
projects.description: Contributed core features and tests to improve caching and async state management.

projects.name: SaaS Task Manager
projects.description: Developed a full-featured task management platform with multi-user support and analytics dashboard.

internships.description: Worked on an internal dashboard for analytics using AngularJS and Go APIs.

awards.title: Best Developer Award
awards.description: Received company-wide recognition for outstanding leadership and innovation.

volunteering.title: Coding Mentor
volunteering.description: Mentored underrepresented minorities in tech through Code2040, focusing on React and backend fundamentals.
